        public CPUBoat(BoatType boatType,
               com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 pos,
               Tuple<java.lang.Float,java.lang.Float> laneBounds)
        Creates a boat using a specific boat type and position to be controlled by the computer.
        Parameters:
        boatType - The type of boat to be used as a template for statistics.
        pos - The starting position of the boat.
        laneBounds - The x coordinates of the lane the boat is in.

      • CPUBoat

        Parameters:

        public void decideMovement(java.util.ArrayList<Obstacle> obstacles)
        Decides which direction to move (left/right) given the position of the obstacles around the boat.
        Parameters:
        obstacles - A list of the obstacles in the boat's lane.

      • decideDirection

        private int decideDirection(float thisCenter,
                            float obstacleCenter)
        Decides the direction to move based on the position of an obstacle.
        Parameters:
        thisCenter - The x coordinate of the center of the boat.
        obstacleCenter - The x coordinate of the center of the obstacle.
        Returns:
        -1 or 1 for a given direction. -1 for moving left, 1 for moving right.
